column4: Can anyone help me get youtube working in Chrome on Ubuntu 11.04?
I have falshplugins and ubuntu-restricted-extras installed.
chrome comes with its own flash plugin, as i recall. what happens if you point your browser to about:plugins ?
I'm not sure what you mean by point my browser to about:plugins.
type "about:plugins" in the address bar.
it says I have flash
Flash(2 files) - Version: 10.3.181
the details button will show more useful information
Do you need me to paste you the detailed information for the flash plugin?
if you like. please use a pastebin, though.
I'm new to both irc and irssi. What is a pastebin?
hmm not too sure if this is what the instructions meant
!pastebinit http://paste.ubuntu.com/638930/
that's it, thank you (no need for the "!pastebinit", though :-)
haha okay thanks
can you disable the plugin located at "/usr/lib/flashplugin-installer/libflashplayer.so"? there should be a button located below the entry.
okay i disabled it? do i need to restart browser?
please.
hmm same effect as before. video window is just a black squre
hmm. you might consider trying this: http://whatan00b.com/enabling-flash-in-chrome-on-ubuntu-10-04
you got chrome from the ubuntu repository, i guess?
ummmm i acutally dont remember. it hink i just googled chrome for ubuntu on ffx and took the first link
i'll try the instructions on the link and see how it plays out. thanks!
best of luck. consider also installing the version from the ubuntu repositories.
